sense.def: Alternative Names feng zhen 疹風 , papules wind; yin zhen 癮 疹 , dormant papules. PC, brought forth by wind evil, of eruptive skin papules of different sizes, accompanied by unbearable itching. If scratched they rise further. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 風邪客 於肌中…風疹瘙癢，皆由於此 , “Wind evil has settled in the skin. .. as a result wind papules and itching develop”. Feng zheng 風證 , wind conditions [3]

Pathological Condition brought about by evil wind. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 13: 脚氣而挾風毒，毒少風多，則風 證偏見 , “When there is leg qi together with wind poison, and when the poison is little and the wind much, this is a situation where wind conditions appear”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu tou 烏頭 , quotes Qian kun sheng yi mi yun 乾坤生意秘韞 : 一切風證，不問頭風痛風，黃 鴉吊脚風痹 , “All wind conditions , including head wind, pain wind, yellow crow hoisting legs, and wind blockage”.
